/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their lush green leaves contrasting beautifully with the clear blue sky above. Buildings, painted in shades of red and white, line the street, their architectural style hinting at the rich history of the city. The image is captured from a low angle, adding depth and perspective to the scene. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the red and white of the buildings standing out against the blue sky. The image provides a glimpse into the urban landscape of Beijing, showcasing its blend of natural beauty and architectural charm.
